channel.title: Why can't i play on any client?
channel.description:
Hi , I downloaded like 10 clients but it doesn't work . It always says java doesn't get recognised by an intern or extern assignment , program or batchfile.
This is litteraly translated from dutch so if it isn't readable try to understand ;( Grtz, sh00t3r

item.title: Why can't i play on any client?
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

umm i just tryed to help some one with the same problem,i think your java version is to old so try and update it, Hope this helped.

Read full topic
item.source: Why can't i play on any client?

item.title: Why can't i play on any client?
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Try setting your environment variables.

http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&site=index.php&q=environment+variables+runelocus&btnG=Search

Go on the second one from the top and read chapter 6. That should sort it out for you.

Hope this helps!

ed

Read full topic
